title: Dutch meatballs
ingredients: ['500g beef mince (or 250g beef mince and 250g pork mince)', '1 small onion, finely chopped', 'couple of sprigs parsley, finely chopped', '40g dried breadcrumbs', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper', '1 tablespoon mustard', 'pinch of ground nutmeg', '50g butter', '1 tablespoon sweet soy sauce, or to taste', '1 tablespoon ketchup or tomato puree, or to taste', '1 teaspoon mustard, or to taste']
